Name: Petrie
Description:
The Division of Petrie consists of:

  • part of the Brisbane City Council, and
  • part of the Moreton Bay Regional Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: The area is mainly residential with some light industrial and commercial activities.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Andrew Petrie, 1798-1872, a noted civil engineer, pioneer, explorer and the first free settler in Brisbane in 1837.

DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion
